game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to Quest Giver.
game.description: Rumors say the artifact is hidden deep in the forest. Be cautious, it's said to be guarded by mystical creatures.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.description: Search for any clues leading to the artifact's location.
You must overcome the mystical guardian to claim the artifact.
